items.text: I have been an software engineer at Apple since 2016. During that time, I have been developing software features for the Apple Watch and learning about onâ€“device personalization and machine learning.

Most recently I have joined the Machine Intelligence team continue to pursue on-device machine learning. For watchOS 7 we worked to create an experience for interactive Handwashing tracking helping people to stay healthy.

Previously I worked on the watch faces team and played a cirtical role in creating the Siri Watch Face. By using on-device personalization this watch face is able to suggest the right content at the right time.
I was lucky enough to be able to present some of our work at WWDC 2018 where we had enabled 3rd party integration on the Siri Watch Face!
Siri Shortcuts on the Siri Watch Face
